info.title: Commodities Reference Service
info.description: Retrieves details for internal A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S ("MAERSK") Commodity Codes. This version of the service now includes Harmonized System (HS) Codes. # Overview Retrieves a list of internal A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S Commodity Codes and associated details for use with the **Ocean Booking API** for the `commodityCode` input parameter. # Who can get access? All registered users of the Maersk Developer Portal can get access to the API. # Getting started After creating an account, **login** and create an App to enable this API product for your Consumer Key. For step-by-step instructions, please refer to our **Getting Started Guide**. # How many calls can I make? Traffic and spike arrest limits are configured at the consumer key level for each API Product as detailed in the table below. If these limits are exceeded, the request is rejected with a 429 Too Many Requests HTTP status code. | Quota per Consumer Key | Traffic Surge Rate Limit per Consumer Key | |------------------------|-------------------------------------------| | 15,000 calls per hour | 250 calls per minute | # Release Notes | Version | Date | Notes | |---------|------|-------| | 1.0.0 | 2022-xx-xx | initial release | | 1.1.0 | 2024-07-17 | added HS commodities to response; added the option to GET all commodities; added the hsCommodityCode as a query parameter. |

get.description:
Retrieves a list of internal A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S Commodity Codes and
associated details.  This service now includes Harmonized System (HS)
Commodity names and Codes.

If no query parameters are included in the request, all commodities will
be returned in the response.  When using query parameters, follow the
specified rules for each parameter to filter the results accordingly.

parameters.name: commodityName
parameters.description:
Keyword(s) containing at least 2 alpha characters used to search
Commodity Name for a specific Commodity as defined by A.P.
Moller-Maersk A/S.

**Note:** `commodityName` and `hsCommodityCode` are not permitted if `commodityCode` is used

parameters.name: cargoType
parameters.description:
The type of cargo to be shipped for a specific Commodity code as defined by A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S
* DRY - Dry cargo
* REEFER - Reefer (refrigerated) cargo
* OOG - Out of Guage cargo
* DANGEROUS - Dangerous cargo

parameters.name: commodityCode
parameters.description:
The unique 6-digit code used internally to identify commodities for
A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S e.g '000903'

parameters.name: hsCommodityCode
parameters.description:
Optional hsCommodityCode to fetch commodities

**Note:** `commodityName` and `hsCommodityCode` are not permitted if `commodityCode` is used

200.description: Returns the list of commodity codes and associated descriptions

404.description: No commodity groups found or bad URL.

Commodity.description: The Description and Code retrieved for a commodity as defined by A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S

commodityCode.description: The unique 6-digit code used internally to identify commodities for A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S

commodityName.description: The Name used internally to describe commodities for A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S

cargoTypes.description: The cargo type of the commodity for a specific Commodity code as defined by A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S

hasUSFlag.description: indicator that identifies a commodity must be transported on a US Flag vessel as defined by A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S

hsCommodityCodes.description: HS Commodity Codes, names and codes

hsCommodityName.example: Fish; frozen, eels (Anguilla spp.), excluding fillets, fish meat of 0304, and edible fish offal of subheadings 0303.91 to 0303.99

method.description: The request method type e.g. GET, POST.

status.description: The textual representation of the response status.

timestamp.description: The date and time (dd-MM-yyyy hh:mm:ss) the error occured.

id.description: Id to trace error details in log

subErrors.description: The list of invalid fields in the request.

field.description: The field that has failed validation.

rejectedValue.description: The value that has failed validation.

message.description: The reason and advice for failed validation.

ApiKeyHeader.name: Consumer-Key
ApiKeyHeader.description: The Consumer Key issued for your registered application must be provided with every request
